summary: MODULE TRANSMISSION WAS INSTALLED IN MY CAR WHICH HAVE ONLY 51661 MILES THIS IS AN ON GOING PROBLEM IN THESE CARS CAUSING THEM NOT TO SHIFT AND I COULD ONLY GO 20MPH IN HEAVY TRAFFIC CREATING A SAFETY HAZARD. I WAS CHARGED $1919.58 FOR REPAIRS. MY TRANSMISSION WAS SERVICED IN OCT.2016 . I FEEL THAT THIS PROBLEM SHOULD BE ON THE RECALL BEFORE SOMEONE LOSE THERE LIFE. THE PROBLEM COMES WITH NO WARNING. THE CAR WAS IN MOTION. ON A CITY STREET.
